description: OPINION AND ORDER GRANTING MOTION TO DISMISS re: The motion to dismiss counterclaims for failure to join an indispensable party and on forum non conveniens by Counter-Defendant Bees360 is GRANTED, limited to grounds stated under Rule 12(b)(7). Dkt 62  at 22.Its further request to dismiss this entire action on those same grounds is also GRANTED. Id at 23. This action is DISMISSED WITHOUT PREJUDICE.This is a FINAL JUDGMENT.
